name: Magnetoboy
description:
Magnetoboy

A Game for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

By Zerotwopac and ToonKoon

Controls:

  • UP - arrow up  /  W
  • DOWN - arrow down / S
  • RIGHT - arrow right / D
  • LEFT - arrow left / A
  • ROTATELEFT - Q
  • ROTATERIGHT - E
  • GRAB - Spacebar
  • UNGRAB - Spacebar
  • FULLSCREEN -  F4
  • SELECT - Enter
  • QUIT - ESC

Disclaimer: All levels are feasible
